headers.value: default-src 'self' https:; form-action 'self' script.google.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' www.google-analytics.com vercel.live www.digistats.ch www.googletagmanager.com; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data: fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' vitals.vercel-insights.com *.google-analytics.com digistats.ch;
